raw_text: COORAY – DR. NILANTHI – Dearly beloved wife of Frank Cooray (Retired St. Sebastians College,​ Moratuwa),​ loving mother of Yashani & Aruni (HSBC HonKong),​ mother-in-law of Indika (Union Bank,​ Col-3) & Clive (HSBC HongKong),​ loving grandmother of Yashane,​ Rashael,​ Aaron & Yeneli,​ loving daughter of late Raymond and Audrey,​ sister of Siromi and Prof. Harindra Fernando (USA),​ sister-in-law of late Linton and Ravini. Funeral will take place on Saturday, 19th Aug. 2023 at St. Joseph’s Church,​ Uyana,​ Moratuwa at 4.30 p.m. Cortege leaves residence ‘Mount Carmel’,​ No. 116/​7,​ Idama,​ Moratuwa.052157

WEBSTER – MERVYN – Beloved husband of Sheila,​ father of Gordon,​ Norman and Gillian,​ father-in-law of Michelle,​ Virginia and Jeremy,​ brother-in-law of late George and of Marie and Valerie,​ beloved grandfather of Tamara,​ Nigel,​ Tiffany,​ Brittany and Hamish,​ great grandfather of Silas,​ passed away peacefully at the age of 99 on the 10th of August 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Monday,​ the 21st of August,​ from 10.00 a.m. to 2.45 p.m. followed by a Service. Cortege leaves Parlour at 3.30 p.m. for Cremation at 4.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Old Crematorium).051558

WIJESINGHE – MALLIKA – Daughter of late Mr & Mrs A.G. Hinniappuhamy,​ beloved wife of Gamini Wijesinghe,​ beloved mother of Prabha,​ Araliya,​ Devaka,​ Vishni,​ Dr. Yasas,​ Roshini & Mangala,​ beloved grandmother of Rahul,​ Hansika,​ Isuri & Bawantha,​ beloved great-grandmother of Ohana,​ beloved sister of Rathnapala,​ Yasmin Leena (Australia) & Kamala. Leaving residence – 152A,​ Duwa Road,​ Beddagana,​ Pitakotte at 4.15 p.m. for cremation at 5.00 p.m. General Cemetery,​ Borella on 19th August 2023.052387
